LanguageData.VWE_HyperCapacitor.label: hyper-capacitor
LanguageData.VWE_HyperCapacitor.description: This weapon replaces a standard mechanical firing pin or gas system with an electronic rail-assist powered by a massive capacitor. It eliminates the mechanical cycling time between shots almost entirely, but the capacitor takes a significantly long time to charge before the first shot can be fired.
LanguageData.VWE_Ultracoils.label: ultracoils
LanguageData.VWE_Ultracoils.description: This weapon features extended, super-conductive acceleration rails that launch projectiles at hypersonic velocities, drastically increasing range and armor penetration at the cost of cycle time.
LanguageData.VWE_CryptoCoatedRails.label: crypto-coated rails
LanguageData.VWE_CryptoCoatedRails.description: The magnetic acceleration rails are coated in the crypto-particle cooling jacket, preventing the overheating common in charge weaponry and allowing for a much faster rate of fire.
LanguageData.VWE_VectorCompensator.label: vector compensator
LanguageData.VWE_VectorCompensator.description: The barrel is lined with micro-magnetic coils that adjust the projectile's trajectory in mid-air. This "smart bullet" system actively corrects aim error, granting perfect accuracy, but requires lighter, smaller projectiles to function.
